page.title: 18WEST FELTON RECREATION
page.content: THERE IS AN EIGHTEEN HOLE GOLF COURSE AT QUEENS HEAD,OSWESTRY GOLF CLUB,WITH A LARGE CLUBHOUSE AND ITS OWN PROFESSIONAL.THE "FOX AND HOUNDS" HAS A CROWN-GREEN BOWLING GREEN AT THE REAR,WHERE LOCAL AND AREA TOUNAMENTS ARE HELD,AND IT ALSO HAS A DARTS AND DOMINOES TEAM. THE "PUNCH BOWL" HAS A POOL ROOM AND ALSO A DARTS AND DOMINOES TEAM.THE "QUEENS HEAD" HAS SMALL BORE SHOOTING AND DARTS. THE BADMINTON CLUB MEETS IN THE VILLAGE HALL ON A TUESDAY NIGHT. FISHING IS POPULAR ON THE CANAL,AND CLAY PIGEON SHOOTS ARE FREQUENTLY HELD IN THE AREA,AND ALSO,OF COURSE,PHEASANT SHOOTING ON THE ESTATES. THERE IS A PLAYING FIELD FOR CHILDREN NEAR THE CHAPEL,AND VILLAGE SPORTS ARE HELD THERE EVERY YEAR.
